name: Containment (itch)
description:
Ludum Dare #34 - Theme: Growing, Two button controls

The following document #TS0234034 has been declassified.

BEGIN DOCUMENT

A lab experiment ██████████ ███ █████ from ███████████ ████ has broken containment and is loose in the ███████ lab. You must begin the fail-safe procedure ██████ to stop it. Some ████ ██████ and ████ are still █████ so make sure to ████████ ████ ████ with ████. Quickly reconfigure the peg matrix before time runs out. In case of emergency contact: █████████████

Make the connections on the plug-board and press the big red button!
(This only has one level. I ran out of time)

Made for 1024x768. Others look ok too. But ████████ looks the best.

Instructions:

  • Move the pegs and make connections between the panels
  • Click once to select, click again to place (or drop)
  • To ████ press ████ while holding ████ and
  • Selection is made at the end of the peg where the wire connects
  • Wires can not be pulled to stretch longer, must be move
  • Make sure you don't ███████ or ██████ will happen.
